attributes.action: get a vote of no confidence against the current government due to they failings in the her majesties tax revenues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they've lost cd's of 25 million families every detail, they've lost a cd of 15 thousand peoples tax details, they've screwed up all the national insurence numbers which could all be used to cause lots of grieve in our names which we'd all be punished for nstead of the people taking our identities. do we really want this government running this country

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
